snippet: The festival, which is going by the name PAC MAC (for Patchogue Arts Council, Music Arts and Cinema), will wend its way between indoor venues and outdoor spaces, including streets, plazas, alley walkways and gardens.
abstract: PAC MAC, named for Patchogue Arts Council, Music Arts and Cinema, will present music, arts and cinema in variety of venues in downtown Patchogue (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The festival, which is going by the name PAC MAC (for Patchogue Arts Council, Music Arts and Cinema), will wend its way between indoor venues and outdoor spaces, including streets, plazas, alley walkways and gardens.

headline.seo: A Festival Testifies to Patchogue’s Turnaround
headline.main: A Festival Testifies to a Village’s Turnaround
headline.print_headline: A Festival Testifies to a Village’s Turnaround
